Module CODEX
Package CODEX.distributed.RMI

Interface GameControllerInterface

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
GameController
public interface GameControllerInterface extends Remote
This is the interface of gameController's methods

  • Method Details

    • getId

      int getId() throws RemoteException
      Getter method
      Returns:
      the ID of the gameController
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an exception happens while communicating with the remote

    • getGame

      Game getGame() throws RemoteException
      Getter method
      Returns:
      the game of the related gameController
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an exception happens while communicating with the remote

    • addRMIClient

      void addRMIClient(String nickname, ClientGeneralInterface rmiClient) throws RemoteException
      This method is called remotely by the RMIClient when he asks to create a Lobby or join a Lobby
      Parameters:
      nickname - is the nickname of the Client
      rmiClient - is the client who is joining the game
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an exception happens while communicating with the remote

    • playBaseCard

      void playBaseCard(String nickname, PlayableCard baseCard, boolean orientation) throws RemoteException
      This method let the Player place the baseCard (in the middle of the table) and, if all the players have placed their baseCard, it let the Game finish the set-up phase giving the last necessary cards
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player who plays the card
      baseCard - the base card played
      orientation - of the played card
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an exception happens while communicating with the remote

    • drawCard

      void drawCard(String nickname, PlayableCard selectedCard) throws RemoteException
      This method allows the currentPlayer to draw a card from the decks or from the unveiled ones
      Parameters:
      nickname - of the player who is going to draw the card
      selectedCard - is the Card the Players wants to draw
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an exception happens while communicating with the remote

    • chooseObjectiveCard

      void chooseObjectiveCard(String chooserNickname, ObjectiveCard selectedCard) throws RemoteException
      This method allows the chooser Player to select his personal ObjectiveCard
      Parameters:
      chooserNickname - is the nickname of the player selecting the ObjectiveCard
      selectedCard - is the ObjectiveCard the player selected
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an exception happens while communicating with the remote

    • playCard

      void playCard(String nickname, PlayableCard selectedCard, Coordinates position, boolean orientation) throws RemoteException, IllegalArgumentException
      This method "plays" the card selected by the Player in his own Board
      Parameters:
      nickname - is the nickname of the Player that wants to play a card
      selectedCard - the Card the Player wants to play
      position - the position where the Player wants to play the Card
      orientation - the side on which the Player wants to play the Card
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if there is an error in playing the card
      RemoteException - if an exception happens while communicating with the remote

    • choosePawnColor

      void choosePawnColor(String chooserNickname, Pawn selectedColor) throws RemoteException, ColorAlreadyTakenException
      This method allows a player to choose a Pawn color
      Parameters:
      chooserNickname - is the nickname of the player who is going to select the Pawn
      selectedColor - the chosen colour
      Throws:
      ColorAlreadyTakenException - if the pawn has been chosen by another user before
      RemoteException - if an exception happens while communicating with the remote
      ColorAlreadyTakenException - if the color chosen is already taken

    • sendMessage

      void sendMessage(String senderNickname, List<String> receiversNicknames, String message) throws RemoteException
      This method allows the player to send a text message in the chat
      Parameters:
      senderNickname - is the nickname of the player who sends the message
      receiversNicknames - are the nickname of the players who are going to receive the message
      message - the string (message) sent
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an exception happens while communicating with the remote

    • checkNPlayers

      void checkNPlayers() throws RemoteException
      This method is invoked when we need to check how many players there are in the game. If the number of players inside is correct, then it starts the game
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an exception happens while communicating with the remote

    • checkBaseCardPlayed

      void checkBaseCardPlayed() throws RemoteException
      This method checks if all the players have played their base card. If they all did, then it gives the initial cards for the starting of the match.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an exception happens while communicating with the remote

    • checkObjectiveCardChosen

      void checkObjectiveCardChosen() throws RemoteException
      This method is invoked to check if all the players have chosen their objective card
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an exception happens while communicating with the remote

    • checkChosenPawnColor

      void checkChosenPawnColor() throws RemoteException
      This method is invoked to check if all the players have chosen their pawn color
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an exception happens while communicating with the remote

    • getGamePlayers

      List<Player> getGamePlayers() throws RemoteException
      Getter method
      Returns:
      the list of the players in the game
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an exception happens while communicating with the remote

    • heartbeat

      void heartbeat(String nickname) throws RemoteException
      This method is used for receiving the heartbeats to check disconnections
      Parameters:
      nickname - of the player
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an exception happens while communicating with the remote

    • startHeartbeat

      void startHeartbeat(String nickname) throws RemoteException
      This method is used for starting the heartbeats to check disconnections
      Parameters:
      nickname - of the player
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an exception happens while communicating with the remote
